name: Nanni 2
description:
Take yourself into this adventure on the world between. From Spring to winter. From sunrise to the night. If you survive till the end, you'll see what you have worked for.

---- TEAM ----

Dregon: Team Lead, Game Programmer, UI Editor

Mat: Team Lead, Game Programmer, Sound System Designer, UI Editor, Narrative

Munsa: Environment Assets Artist, VFX

Stefan: Level Designer

Dada and Titania: Voice Over
